title: BANNED??/???????
body: I Just bought this account level 23 so i didnt have to level it up from one to thirty i played a few games on it and i wasnt toxic at all and im perma banned???? help please

replies.body: LOL, you broke the terms of service by buying an account then came here and admitted it asking for an unban? Genius.

[**Account Selling**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202290340) is strictly against the terms and services. There's a pretty good chance that the account is locked while the original account creator tries to recover it to themselves.
